total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows that contain the number 2 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that contain the number 1 in the input grid.
Q3: For each row containing the number 1, check if there are two consecutive 1s.
Q4: If there are two consecutive 1s, keep them as they are. If there is only one 1, replace it with two consecutive 1s.
Q5: Replace the original rows containing the number 1 with the modified rows from Q4.
Q6: Keep the rows containing the number 2 and the rows with only 0s as they are.

Q6: Keep the rows containing the number 2 as they are.
Q7: Replace all other rows with rows containing only 0s.
